There was one other sighting in Charlotte on or around July 4th 2012
Summary: red glowing plane/ship hovered over Charlotte area, then headed directly to Monroe, hovered then disappeared before the fireworks started.
divs: sighting details7\4\2012 - last night at the fireworks in monroe, nc, while we were all waiting for the fireworks to start (which started late) we all seen this red glow like plane or ship come out of now where like just hovering the charlotte area. it looked like it wasn't moving, then quickly headed over us in monroe. then it hovered a minute or two and disappeared. everyone was in shock and talking about how this red glowing thing was heading toward us, and then when it just disappeared.
